channel.title: 667: Slayer
channel.description: I'm a little troubled with this, I have a guy who gives out slayer tasks, but he gives out "Bears" / "Bats" , etc which I guess is fine. But when he gave a player Crawling Hands & we went to the slayertower he killed them, but it didn't give him XP.

item.title: 667: Slayer
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You need to reduce the task amount left by handling the death. In your NPC death handling method add something like:

void npcDead(Player player, Npc npc) { // method name will almost definitely be different if (player.getTaskId() == CRAWLING_HAND_ID && npc.getId() == CRAWLING_HAND_ID) { player.taskAmt--; } }

Read full topic

item.title: 667: Slayer
item.dc:creator: @Vinnyy Vinnyy
item.description:
@Vinnyy wrote:

I’m a little troubled with this, I have a guy who gives out slayer tasks, but he gives out “Bears” / “Bats” , etc which I guess is fine. But when he gave a player Crawling Hands & we went to the slayertower he killed them, but it didn’t give him XP.
